title: A Symphony of Agricultural Machines in the Fields  HuTaNaTu

tasks.task: Watching a video involving a military project.
subtasks: Sitting or standing while watching the video.
Listening to announcements or messages during the video.
Not interrupting the video by leaving.
Possibly leaning in for better viewing.

tasks.task: Observing a video with multiple interruptions.
subtasks: Taping the video or device to a surface to hold it steady.
Ignoring the interruptions and continuing to watch the video.
Rewinding or pausing the video when necessary.
Adjusting audio volume or quality as needed.

tasks.task: Following instructions or announcements within a video.
subtasks: Not reacting to the repeated interruptions by leaving.
